name: Monarch Mash
description:
The result of an 8 week class learning Unity and C# from zero knowledge. This was the project we kept changing as we learned more.

Monarch Mash! You are a peasant during the French Revolution. Aristocracy has taken big hits but they're not done yet! Back from the grave come these despicable royals. Evade them for as long as you can!

Future Goth splits development between three members: Alex Pochmara, Natalie Steffen, and Schuyler Rice.
